channel.title: Menu-rsses on Andrea’s Italian
channel.description: Recent content in Menu-rsses on Andrea’s Italian

item.title: Menu
item.description:
Appetizers

Calamari Fritti$10.95
Crispi calamari served with a spicy marinara dipping sauce
Fresh Steamed Mussels$9.95
Steeped in a spicy tomato broth
Shrimp Stella$10.95
Served in a creamy lobster sauce with fresh crab meat or served with a white wine lemon butter sauce
Fried Mozzarella$6.99
Served with tomato marinara sauce
Prosciutto$8.99
Prosciutto served with slices of mozzarella or with fresh slices of melon
Smoked Salmon$7.99
Served with a side of diced onions, capers, balsamic, olive oil and lemons

Salads

Cesar Salad$4.95
Romaine leaves tossed in a traditional Caesar dressing topped with croutons
Mozzarella Salad$5.99
Fresh mozzarella with hearty tomatoes in basil, oregano and olive seasoning
Three Cheese Salad$4.95
Mixed spring greens and tomatoes topped with Gorgonzola, parmesan and Pecorino romano cheese

Pastas

Linguine$11.95
With fresh basil and marinara sauce
Linguine Carbonara$12.95
Egg yolk, cream, bacon and parmesan cheese
Linguine Puttanesca$12.95
Olive oil, capers, olives, bacon, fresh chopped tomatoes and anchovies
Linguine Alfredo$13.95 w/chicken, $15.99 w/shrimp
Pasta in a classic Romano cheese and cream sauce with chicken or shrimp
Linguine with Shrimp$15.95
Served with a pesto cream sauce with parmesan cheese
Linguine Bolognese$13.99
Served with ground beef in portabello mushrooms covered with marina sauce and parmesan cheese
Angel Mussels Marinara$12.99
Pasta with mussels in a tomato and white wine sauce
Vegetarian Angel Hair$11.99
Wheat angel hair pasta served with fresh sautéed veggies
Angel Hair Pasta$15.99
Pasta in a light cream sauce with shrimp, garnished with fresh vegetables and parmesan cheese
Pasta Andrea$14.99
Penne pasta with chicken mushroom in a pesto cream sauce with ham and parmesan cheese
Andrea’s Caneloni$14.99
Stuffed crab meat, spinach and 4 cheeses (gogonzola, ricotta, mozzarella, parmesan) Served in Alfredo cream sauce or marinara sauce
Gnocchi Andrea$14.99
Home made potato gnocchi scented with a touch of cinnamon and served with basil marinara or gorgonzola cream sauce
Veal Tortolini$13.99
Pasta stuffed with veal served in a pink cream sauce with ham and parmesan
Ravioli$13.99
Stuffed with mushrooms and spinach served in a cream lobster sauce
Fruti Di Mari$16.95
Linguine pasta, mixed seafood and fresh vegetables in a white wine sauce
Victor’s Rissoto$14.99
Italian rice with slices of chicken breast, portobello mushrooms and shrimp served with capers in white wine and lemon-butter sauce
Chicken Portabello Risotto$14.99
Italian rice with slices of chicken breast and portobello mushrooms served in a cream with parmesan cheese
Seafood Risotto$15.99
Italian rice with calamari, mussels, shrimp and white fish in a light marinara sauce
Italian Classic Lasagna$15.95
Prepared fresh daily with layers of pasta, Italian cheeses and our homemade meat sauce
Crespelle$13.99
Stuffed with ricotta, spinach, mozzarella cheese and topped with a cream sauce
Cavatelli$13.95
Cavatelli pasta served with fresh tomato, basil, oregano, garlic and topped off with a sprinkle of fresh goat cheese
Penne Arrabiata$13.99
Tossed with chicken and tomato-basil sauce with crushed red pepper
Italian Penne$14.95
Served with fresh tomatoes, basil and italian sauce

Entress

Sautéed Shrimp$16.99
Served in a white wine lemon-butter sauce or served a la diabla
Pan Séered Tilapia$15.95
With a white wine, lemon-butter sauce with capers and shrimp or a la moda, olive oil, fresh basil and tomato
Grilled Atlantic Salmon Filet$16.99
Served with creamy lobster sauce or a white wine, lemon-butter sauce
Ciopinno$16.99
Seafood combination and vegetables
Egg-Plant Parmesan$13.99
With mozzarella, parmesan and marinara sauce and server with house vegetables
Pork Loin Scaloppine$14.99
Served in a red wine demi-glazed sauce with green pepper corns and portobello mushrooms
Chicken Milanesa$14.99
Baked chicken served with a lemon-butter sauce
Grilled Chicken Breast$14.99
Sautée with vegetables
Chicken Parmesan$15.95
Baked with mozzarella, parmesan and marinara sauce
Chicken Breast Cordon Bleu$15.95
Covered with slices of ham and cheese, topped with a cream sauce
Sautée Chicken Breast$15.95
with choice of:

  • Marsala sauce with mushroome
  • Picatta sauce with white wine, lemon-butter sauce and capers
  • Demi-Glaze sauce with portobello mushrooms
  • Pizzaiola sauce, capers, olives, marinara, basil and oregano
  • Tomatillo marinara, toasted chiles and green tomatillo sauce
Rib-Eyed Steak$23.99
With portobello mushrooms in a red wine demi-glazed sauce or with devil sauce marinara, toasted chilies and green tomatillo sauce
Veal Parmesan$21.99
Baked with mozzarella and marinara sauce
Veal Scaloppine$22.99
with choice of:

  • Marsala sauce with mushrooms
  • Picatta sauce with white wine, lemon-butter sauce and capers
  • With Prosciutto over a red winr demi-glazed sauce

White Wines

Bottle Glass
Salmon Creek White Zinfandel $23 $6.50
Spicy strawberry and citrus aromas with bright acidity and a touch of sweetness.
Cadonini Pinot Grigio $26 $7
Lush and full-bodied with a light, fruity, finishing clean and tart.
Colosi Bianco, Italy $30
Ripe apricot and apple aromas and touch of acidity give good balance.
Santa Carolina Sauvignon Blane, Chile $29
Bright tropical fruits up front with a tart, citrus finish.
Salmon Creek Chardonnay, California $23 $6.75
Tropical flavors with a touch of spice and a full-bodied finish.
Arancio Chardonnay, Sicily $30
Crisp apple flavors with sof acidity and ripe melon and honey aromas due to the blending of viognier.
Chalone Monterey Chardonnay, California $30
Citrus and green apple aromas are balanced with spice, carmel and vanilla on the finish.

Red Wines

Bottle Glass
Sartori Pinot Noir, Italy $29 $7.75
Expressive ripe red fruit aromas are forward and delicious while the wine finishes soft and supple.
Castle Rock Pinot Noir,California $30
A balance between tart cherry flavors and earthy aromas.
Salmon Creek Merlot, California $23 $6.75
Smooth, subtle cherry and blueberry fruit leading into a finish of vanilla and chocolate.
Cono Sur Merlot, Chile $30
Dark, tart berry fruit, licorice and spice with an easy finish of sweet oak.
Kris Pinot Noir, Italy $36
Dark ruby red in color with purple hues. Shows aromas of ripe blackberries.
Querciavalle Chianti Classico, Tuscany $54
Ripe, full berry fruite, up front with cocoa and a touch of dryness on the finish.
Penfolds Shiraz, Australia $29
Red berry, plum and black pepper aromas mingled with cocoa and spice.
Tierra Secreta Malbee, Argentina $34
Dark with a taste of black currant, raspberry flavors.
Viteo, Spain $32
This 100% tempranillo wine shows bright cherry fruit balanced with acidity and earthy aromas finishing with a subtle nuttiness.
Castelvero Barbera d’Asti, Italy $34
Light bodied and tart with red cherry and cassis fruit and touch of minerality on the finish.
Piccini, Chianti, Italy $23 $6.75
Tart red cherry and raspberry flavors finish with smoke, dusty earth.
Castello D’Abola Chianti Classico, Italy $32
Delicious cherry flavors with good acid and a touch of vanilla.
Queretaro Chianti Classico, Italy $32
Intense fruit aromas with rich, well-structured berry flavors.
Centine Rosso, Italy $32
Lots of structure from a base of Sangiovese supported by the fruit aromas of Merlot and Cabernet.
Trivento Reserve Malbee, Argentina $32
Dark, dry fruit and earthy aromas give this wine depth and complexity.
Bogle Petite Syrah, California $32
Blackberry and plum flavors start rich and finish with a hint of white pepper and oak.
Antigal Uno Malbee, Argentina $32
A velvety blend of two varietals that creates a medium body and smooth finish.
Salmon Creek Cabernet Sauvignon $23
Medium body with berry, olive and vanilla flavors for a well-balanced wine.
Santa Carolina Reserve Cabernet $33
Sweet black currants dominate the flavor white the finish brings soft spice aromas and tannic structure.
Chateau St. Jean Cabernet Sauvignon, California $32
A rich wine with lots of blackberry and cassis with aromas of tobacco and cocoa leading into a well-structured vanilla and oak finish.
Cavicchioli, Lambrusco $23 $6.50
Smooth and lush. A delicious ‘amabile’ wine with an intense ruby red color, and a generous froth.

All published prices are subject to change without prior notice.
